document.docAuthor: Zhang, Dandan, Cai, Yanpeng & Li, Houhun
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic review of the genus Paratalanta Meyrick, 1890 (Lepidoptera: Crambidae: Pyraustinae) from China, with descriptions of two new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomic review of the genus Paratalanta Meyrick, 1890 (Lepidoptera: Crambidae: Pyraustinae) from China, with descriptions of two new species

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Epicorsia pandalis Hübner, 1825 : 355
. Type locality: Augsburg.

: 23
.

. Type locality: France , Seine-et-Marne, Chartrettes.
Botys pandalis
var. bergunensis
Zeller, 1878
: 90
. Type locality: Ober-Albula in Graubünden.
Botys jessica
Butler, 1878
: 58
.

Host plants.
Phyllostachys bambusoides Sieb. et Zucc.
,
P. nigra
var. henonis Stape
,
P. pubescens Mazel
,
P. nigra Munro (
Kim & Lee, 1986
)
.
Distribution. China (Gansu, Guangdong, Guizhou, Hebei, Hubei, Heilongjiang, Jiangsu, Liaoning, Ningxia, Shanxi, Sichuan), Korea , Japan , Russia (Ussuri), Europe.
Ecology. Caught in lowland from 430 m to 700 m , in mountains from 800 m to 2600 m . Flight period from end of May to early October.
